forum.content:
最近因為一些事情，這首歌實在給我太多感觸

歌詞是我用自己的文字翻譯的，若有超譯，也是代表本人心情而已

最後 rip Chester 你的歌聲永遠是我的救贖

This is not the end
This is not the beginning
這非開始 亦非結束
Just a voice like a riot
Rocking every revision
一團混亂的聲響 擾動每一次的修復

But you listen to the tone
And the violent rhythm
And though the words sound steady
Something empty's within 'em
你聽著那些曲調以及狂亂的節奏
那些看似普通的文字
透露著若有似無的空虛

We say, "yeah"
Fists flying up in the air
Like we're holding onto something
That's invisible there
我們歡呼著 高舉雙臂
宛若握住那看不見的東西

'Cause we're living at the mercy of
The pain and the fear
Until we get it, forget it
Let it all disappear
因為我們活在痛苦與恐懼的赦免底下
直到我們理解與遺忘
讓一切隨風而逝

Waiting for the end to come
等待著最後走到了終點

Wishing I had strengh to stand
希望還有殘存的力量重新立足

This is not what I had planned
以前說好的現在都變了調

It's out of my control
這不在掌握之中

Flying at the speed of light
以光速飛行

Thoughts were spinning in my head
思緒在我腦海裡盤旋轉動

So many things were left unsaid
許多事情沒有說出口

It's hard to let you go
因為讓你走開，真的好難

I know what it takes to move on
我知道如果繼續走下去，我們將要付出的代價

I know how it feels to lie
我知道說謊的感覺

All I wanna do
Is trade this life for something new
Holding on to what I haven't got
如果可以我希望人生可以重來
然後為我尚未得到的一切堅持下去

Sitting in an empty room
坐在一個空蕩的房間裡

Trying to forget the past
試圖忘記過去

This was never meant to last
從未想過要這樣下去

I wish it wasn't so
我希望不是這樣

What was left When that fire was gone
當烈火燃燒殆盡之後還會剩下什麼

I thought it felt alright
我以為這感覺是對的

But that right was wrong
但這種認知卻是錯的

All caught up in the eye of the storm
被困在暴風眼中

And trying to figure out
試圖想要搞清楚

What it's like moving on
向前邁進是什麼感覺

And I don't even know what kind of things I said
而我甚至不知道自己在說些什麼

My mouth kept moving
千言萬語欲言又止

And my mind went dead
我的腦子卻宛如一灘死水

Picking up the pieces Now where to begin
收拾殘局，現在要從何處著手

The hardest part of ending Is starting again
結束它最難的部份，就是要重新開始

urls.description: Linkin Park "Waiting For The End" off of the album A THOUSAND SUNS. Directed by Joe Hahn. http://www
urls.title: Waiting For The End (Official Video) - Linkin Park

forum.title: Linkin Park- Waiting for the End (歌詞翻譯）
